title: Health Monitoring Alerts
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to receive automated alerts for abnormal health readings so that I can ensure timely intervention for myself or my family members, maintaining my well-being and enabling me to support my community volunteering.

title: Medication Management Support
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to remind me about my medication schedule and provide tips for managing my arthritis pain so that I can stay healthy and maintain my independence while volunteering and caring for my family.

title: Shared Health Updates and Alerts
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to receive shared health updates and alerts from my caregivers so that I can stay informed about my health and manage my well-being effectively, even with my limited mobility.

title: Emergency Contact Notifications
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to automatically notify my emergency contacts if I need help, so that I can feel secure and supported while living independently despite my limited mobility and arthritis pain.

title: Long-term Health Tracking – Data Visualization for Health Trends
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to visualize my health data trends over time so that I can better manage my arthritis pain and stay proactive about my physical health.

title: Voice-Guided Medication Reminders
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to provide voice-guided medication reminders so that I can manage my arthritis pain effectively and maintain my independence while keeping my busy schedule.

title: Health Monitoring and Alerts
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to monitor my health conditions and send me medication reminders so that I can manage my arthritis pain effectively and maintain my independence.
